VoiceList.Entry: Yuffie “I know,the Materia,right? I have it stored in a safe place. …Follow me.”
Yuffie “Phew,perfect. Now the Materia is back in its rightful place.”
Cloud “Hey…the order is all messed up.”
Tifa “Hey,what is this? The order of it's all messed up!”
Cid “What the hell's goin' on!? The order of the Materia's all messed up!”
Yuffie “Huh? Oh,it'll be all right…”
“Don't be so picky!”
Yuffie “Anyways, that sure was close.”
“No,normally I would kick their butts, Boom,Bang!!”
“That Corneo guy's a real pain.”
“I'd rather deal with my dad than with that guy.”
“You know,some of those Turk guys are pretty good,huh?”
“At least,after all that, we got the Materia back.”
“Now come on everybody, let's continue our journey…”
“Hey!! W…Wait!”
Yuffie “Oh,all right. Here,I'll give this to you guys.”
“…No,forget it. Besides,they have lots of Materia anyway.”
Yuffie “Here,look,look!”
Yuffie “…”
Yuffie “Come on,wait!”
“No matter what you think, I'm going with you!”
Yuffie “…Next time…”
